data.title: Great ambience, great coffee
data.text: This coffee place is perfectly suited for the Route 66 traveler in need of caffeine in a pleasant atmosphere. The coffee was excellent and the decor very attractive.

data.title: Best Coffee in Springfield
data.text: This is hard, because there are SO many great coffee shops in Springfield, but The Coffee Ethic always wins the best cup for me. The staff is knowledgeable, the atmosphere is fabulous, and the coffee is always top notch.

data.title: Best cappuccino and great atmosphere
data.text: My husband and I love coffee ethic. I haven't had a better cappuccino. Their location makes for great people watching and the staff is so friendly.

data.title: Best Coffee, Best Atmosphere, Best Mission
data.text: The atmosphere of this little coffee shop is incredible. The interior is so inviting, making it a prime place for working, talking, or just enjoying some of their excellent coffee. The Coffee Ethic is a local business, and they work hard to source their coffee extremely well, making it an excellent fair trade location. Every employee is a kind face ready to do anything they can to satisfy their customers.

data.title: Favorite Coffee Place
data.text: This is my favorite coffee place in Springfield. They also have wonderful baked goods! They atmosphere s great, very modern and comfortable.

data.title: Great local spot!
data.text: I will go out of my way to have coffee at a charming local spot vs. a chain any day. This one is worth a little drive to get there on the square. The atmosphere is really neat with exposed brick walls and high ceilings.  The espresso drinks are excellent - I always get an Americano or a cappuccino, and they are nice and bold/strong, not weak or watered down.  Take the time to have it there and enjoy the atmosphere. I definitely come back here every time I'm in Missouri visiting.

data.title: People say, "best in Missouri", no arguments here.
data.text:
Missouri Life magazine recommended 10 coffee shops in Missouri, so I went out to try them.  The Coffee Ethic in Springfield shined above them all. 

This coffee house has highly trained baristas, a welcoming atmosphere, and reasonable prices.  We tried cappuccinos, and they were smooth and flavorful.  We added an espresso shot, that my coffee loving son said was the best he had found yet.  

Although downtown Springfield is not all that exciting, the Park Central Square area is vibrant and interesting.  

Well worth going out of our way to find this most excellent destination.

data.title: Great Atmosphere
data.text:
Let me first say that the staff was very helpful and friendly, the atmosphere very welcoming,  perfect for homework or conversation. 

The coffee was ok. I had a house coffee and a traditional cappuccino. The house coffee was good, not super complex but definitely not bitter or burnt. The cappuccino was ok, the shot not really showing up through the milk, which is what I'm used to tasting. 

Over all, I would say that my experience was definitely good and I would return.

data.title: Better than Better than Starbucks, Not better than others.
data.text:
I like Starbucks just fine. The coffee is burned and expensive, but I like it. The coffee Ethic at least eliminates the "burned" aspect of their coffee. The atmosphere is relaxing and the staff is nice. Their location is very appealing as well, being right down town in the middle of everything with nice sized windows to people watch as you do your work. Their Internet is a few years behind in speeds [as of a few months ago].

Pros:
Good coffee
Great location and atmosphere
A good place to relax and work

Cons:
Pricey
Weak Internet
Smaller store size leads to quick crowds.

data.title: Good coffe, fun atmosphere
data.text: Good coffee or a glass of wine in a fun atmosphere.  I love the benches which were salvaged from an old factory.  We love to come out on a weekend evening and watch people on the square from the patio.

data.title: Average Joint
data.text: Decent coffee, comparable prices to other coffee joints, nice atmosphere. Nothing terrible distinguishable from other shops. It'll do in a pinch.

data.title: Great coffee, great location, & decent service.
data.text: Great place for a specialty coffee if you are visiting the historic Springfield, MO Public Square. Delicious muffins. The sales person could have been a little more attentive to the actual customers and less chatty with a co-worker.

data.title: Excellent Coffee
data.text: stopped by one day while downtown; excellent coffee and cappuccinos; definitely better than the burned-to-a-crisp Starbucks drinks; I got my order to go but it also has a great atmosphere for meeting, studying, etc.

data.title: Nice quiet little coffee shop
data.text: I often go to this coffee shop when I'm downtown shopping or going to the library. the staff is always very polite, and they have excellent coffee AND tea selections. I'm a big tea drinker, so finding a coffee shop with good tea is a must for me. If you are just out on the town, drop in and get a cappuchino, its worth the stop.

data.title: Great Coffee House
data.text: I love coffee and Springfield has plenty of great choices in coffee. This one is located on the downtown square. They will make you an awesome cup of coffee.

data.title: Great coffee drinks at reasonable prices.
data.text:
Great tasting drinks with awesome
Desserts.  We had such a great time there.
We had multiple drinks and enjoyed the staff which was very friendly. Great place
To relax with your drink. Clean restrooms.
Bring your friends here.

data.title: Coffee and more
data.text: I walked in during a down town excursion with my family..... my sister and her son and I just wanted to go out for the fun of it and in the mood for some coffee, and a something to munch on.... This place is small limited sitting,but I am glad we walked in. The staff were very nice, friendly and polite. We had some coffee, lattes and even some pastries that were really good, and let me tell you the coffee was spot on.... I encourage you to please try this place if you like coffee, latte, tea, pastries.... their coffee is smooth and great tasting without the bitterness.....They even have a few tables for you to sit outside and enjoy the weather.... come on you know you want to try it? :):) You will like it I am more than sure of it.....

data.title: The Best Latte I've Ever Had
data.text: I went here for school stuff, and decided to get a vanilla latte. It was AMAZING! It had that awesome foam swirl and everything. It's kind of hard to find, but if you walk around the square, you'll find it. You seriously have to try this coffee.

data.title: Real
data.text: Wonderful in every way possible.  Smooth coffee without the bitter after taste.  Nice presentation.  Atmosphere is accommodating to all.  Clean.  music loud enough for nice ambiance and does not compete with your party's conversation.  One of Springfield's best kept secrets.  WiFi yes. Sweet.

data.title: If you're looking for good espresso come here!
data.text: I had a single late. It was fantastic. The shot was pulled well and the milk was steamed perfectly. The brewed coffee was also good, but not quite strong enough for my taste. Absolutely come here if you want a good cup.
